1.title: Can Cannabis Save Football?
1.plot: The first episode of, Chasing Strains, tackles Kyle's theory that marijuana can save football and explores what he means by this. If, as the US government believes, marijuana is a neuro-protectant, is it the helmet inside your skull that can prevent or reverse long-term damage from repetitive head trauma? Can it indeed help athletes recover from injury faster and replace addictive opioid pain killers? And, once out of the league, can it truly help retired players stave off the memory loss and impulse control problems that plagued players like Dave Duerson and Junior ...

2.title: Behind the Smoke Screen
2.plot: Nearly two years ago--when asked about the NFLs position on marijuana--commissioner Roger Goodell said they would "follow the science". This episode examines the NFLs stance on weed, how they've reacted to players who've been caught using marijuana and what, if anything, they and their doctors are doing to "follow the science". We will also examine the types of injuries suffered by current and former NFL players and how marijuana can be useful in treating these conditions.

4.title: Realm of Caring
4.plot: In this episode Kyle investigates the origins and benefits of the Charlotte's Web strain developed CW Botanicals in Colorado Springs. This strain is high in CBDs and known for it's ability to treat PTSD, seizures and more while having little to no psychoactive effects. Kyle also visits the Real of Caring, an organization dedicated to helping patients, and children suffering from epilepsy, with canabinoidal therapies. While at the annual Realm of Caring Golf Tournament Kyle speaks with fellow NFL players Eugene Monroe, Derrick Morgan and others about cannabis and how ...

-1.title: Personalized Cannabis Medicine
-1.plot: Kyle travels to Boston to speak at the CannMed conference held on the campus of Harvard Medical School. While there, he meets with world leading doctors and scientists researching personalized cannabis medicine, and consults with leading genomic and cannabis researcher, Kevin McKernan. While visiting Kevin's lab, he and Kyle will discuss how genetic research and marijuana can be combined to match different strains to patients and their medical conditions. Kyle also meets with Dr. Raphael Mechoulam, the Israeli pharmacologist who, in 1964, kick-started marijuana ...

imdb.plot outline: Chasing Strains is a 4-part series exploring the potential applications of medical marijuana in sports through the journey of Kyle Turley, a retired All-Pro offensive lineman suffering from pre-CTE symptoms - the very same neurological disease featured in the movie Concussion.
imdb.title: Chasing Strains
plot: _Chasing Strains_ (qv) is a 4-part series exploring the potential applications of medical marijuana in sports through the journey of Kyle Turley, a retired All-Pro offensive lineman suffering from pre-CTE symptoms - the very same neurological disease featured in the movie Concussion.
